amendment.description: An amendment (numbered 1 as printed in the Congressional Record) to exempt discretionary budget authority for the judicial branch from the line-item veto. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of January 27, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 309 (Roll no. 85).
